name: Before the End of the World
name_original: Before the End of the World
description:
You reach the top of the path, where the village stood. You'd heard it was destroyed when fires rained from the sky. But you hadn't pictured this.

The sky is tearing itself open. Fire rains from the heavens. And you've returned home to reflect on the person you fell in love with in your dreams.

Before the End of the World is a Twine game about dreams, reality, and love at the end of the world.

The first Twine game ever made by Lucas J.W. Johnson, Before the End of the World also has music composed by Devin Vibert.
